channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8223696] java/net/httpclient/MaxStreams.java failed with didn't finish within the time-out
item.description:
----------System.out:(56/4753)----------
[TestNG] Running:
  java/net/httpclient/MaxStreams.java

test MaxStreams.testAsString("http://localhost:38118/http2/fixed"): success
test MaxStreams.testAsString("https://localhost:44099/https2/fixed"): failure

item.summary: java/net/httpclient/MaxStreams.java failed with didn't finish within the time-out

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk17u-dev/pull/2395
Date: 2024-04-11 15:25:46 +0000

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/375
Date: 2024-03-18 14:51:12 +0000

Fix request [17u,21u]

I backport this for parity with 17.0.12-oracle,21.0.4-oracle.
No risk, only a test change.
Clean backport.
Test passes. SAP nightly testing passed.

Changeset: 95310eab
Author: Daniel Jeliński <djelinski@openjdk.org>
Date: 2024-01-25 22:01:18 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/95310eab6ce73512b1afc0a7a26a396dd7b6cb7c

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/17536
Date: 2024-01-23 13:15:46 +0000

The test was too slow to complete in time.

When the test takes more than 20 seconds to complete, testNG interrupts the running test and starts a new one. All test cases in the MaxStreams test start with logging "Semaphore acquire"; when the last request succeeds, they log "Semaphore release".

In the latest failure log, the "Semaphore acquire" line was found before the "Sending last request" line; this suggests that the old test case was interrupted and a new one was started before the old one was able to send the last request.
The last request was probably interrupted. The semaphore was not released, and all subsequent test cases timed out waiting for the semaphore.

I'll file a PR to increase the timeout and improve the logging here.

===============================================
java/net/httpclient/MaxStreams.java
Total tests run: 4, Passes: 0, Failures: 4, Skips: 0
===============================================
